content:
In the first three months of the year, the enemy used more than 180 means of damage to attacks in Kiev.

About thisreportedin the Kyiv City Military Administration.

Russian troops were used to strike rockets of different types:

  • 5 units 3m22 "Zircon";
  • 11 units X-47m2 "Dagger";
  • 6 Iskander-M units;
  • 3 units X-69;
  • 1 unit of "caliber";
  • 113 units X-101.

In addition to rockets, the enemy launched 48 shock drones in Kiev.

Earlier in the Air Force of the Armed Forcestoldthat the military of the Russian Federation began to use upgraded fugas aviation bombs for strikes in the frontal regions of Ukraine, in particular in Kharkiv.
title: More than 180 rockets and drones have applied the enemy in Kiev since the beginning of the year
description: This was reported in the Kyiv City Military Administration. Russian troops were used ...
author: Army Inform
